plot: It's long past closing time at the local Speedy Burger, but the customers haven't left. Not the best time for a tiger-costumed robber, especially when he's recognized by one of the customers.
title: Closing Time
plot_es: It's long past closing time at the local Speedy Burger, but the customers haven't left. Not the best time for a tiger-costumed robber, especially when he's recognized by one of the customers.
plot_en: It's long past closing time at the local Speedy Burger, but the customers haven't left. Not the best time for a tiger-costumed robber, especially when he's recognized by one of the customers.
